name: Ghost Cab - A Ghostly Adventure
description:
It's getting late. You're alone. You're about to do overtime, can you make it through the night?
*must be played in fullscreen!

-----
Ghost cab - A Ghostly Adventure follows you, a ghost, working late night at your lame job with your lame boss. Nobdy else showed up tonight so you've got to pick up the slack! Can you make the right choices or will you end up right back where you started.

Ghost cab - A Ghostly Adventure explores romance, heartache, upset and comedy! It's all down to you which avenue you decide to go down.
This is the full and completed game for "A Game By It's Cover 2022"!
(- heavily inspired by the "Ghost Cab" famicase!)

GC-AGA features:
- 25+ endings!
- 30k words!
- 2 weeks of my blood sweat and tears

GC-AGA content warnings/trigger warnings:
- Flashing text constantly/throughout the entire game
- Swearing
- Suggestive themes (extremely mild) 

- timing is weird on the first part (the typewriter effect will change how long the options show up, each browser is different, sadly I could not change this! I promise there are options you might just have to wait a sec! <3)

Credits:

Night (Nightpxel_): Developer (writer/artist/programmer/etc)
Matt Cole Wilson (Instagram / website): for his amazing famicase that inspired this little game!
